page.title: 18LIFE IN ASHURSTWOOD
page.content: There is a lack of facilities in Ash- urstwood which makes life boring.You can attend a youth-club held in the village hall but it is only open once a week.You can play tennis at John Piers Field but you have to pay.You can play football on "The Wreck" but very few facilities exist for young children.Occasionally a barn dance or a disco is held in the village hall and people of all ages attend.They are good for the community spirit.The shops are fairly typical for a small village.There are 2 grocers, a paper shop, Post Office, a hat shop, and a hardware store.The village is surrounded by some beautiful country walks.
